Jennifer_Day:
{{short description|American country music singer|bot=PearBOT 5}} {{For|the Australian volleyball player|Jennifer Margery Day}} {{Use mdy dates|date=September 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Jennifer Day | image = | caption = | image_size = | birth_name = Jennifer Day Morrison | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1979|8|22}} | origin = [[McAlpin, Florida]], U.S.{{cite web |url=http://www.oldies.com/artist-biography/Jennifer-Day.html |title=Jennifer Day Biography |accessdate=January 26, 2008 |work=Oldies.com}} | instrument = Vocals, piano | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 1999–present | label = [[BNA Records|BNA]] | associated_acts = | website = }} '''Jennifer Day Morrison''' (born August 22, 1979) is an American [[country music]] singer. Signed to [[BNA Records]] in late 1999, she has released one studio album (2000's ''The Fun of Your Love''){{cite web |url={{AllMusic|class=artist|id=p393288|pure_url=yes}} |title=Jennifer Day biography |accessdate=January 26, 2008 |last=Konicki |first=Marla |work=[[Allmusic]]}} and has charted two singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' Hot Country Singles & Tracks (now [[Hot Country Songs]]) charts. The album's title track was also featured in the 2000 film ''[[For Love of the Game (film)|For Love of the Game]]''.{{cite web|url=http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m0EIN/is_2000_Feb_7/ai_59215281 |title=Jennifer Day Partners With Sunglass Hut International for Valentine's Day Promotion; Gift with Purchase CD Includes Exclusive Preview Tracks from Day |access-date=January 26, 2008 |date=February 7, 2000 |work=Business Wire |url-status=dead |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20071209161955/http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m0EIN/is_2000_Feb_7/ai_59215281 |archive-date=December 9, 2007 }} ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:16em;"| Album details ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
